snippet: Migrant workers building soccer stadiums in Qatar's desert heat are to be given 'cooling' hard hats to reduce their body temperature and risk of suffering heat stroke, tournament organizers said....
lead_paragraph: Migrant workers building soccer stadiums in Qatar's desert heat are to be given 'cooling' hard hats to reduce their body temperature and risk of suffering heat stroke, tournament organizers said.

headline.main: Qatar World Cup Construction Workers to Get 'Cooling' Hats
headline.print_headline: Qatar World Cup Construction Workers to Get 'Cooling' Hats
